About MobileNetV2

MobileNetV2 is a highly efficient convolutional neural network architecture designed for mobile and embedded devices. This pre-trained model was developed by Google and trained on the ImageNet dataset, containing over 14 million images across 1000 categories.

Key Features:
  • Inverted Bottleneck Blocks: First expands channels and then filters them
  • Residual Connections: Improve gradient flow
  • Depthwise Separable Convolutions: Significantly reduce parameters and computations

MobileNetV2 achieves 71.8% Top-1 accuracy and 90.6% Top-5 accuracy on the ImageNet dataset.
